homeView.updatesDisabled: Updating a patched app is currently disabled. Repatch the app again.

patcherView.patchDialogText:
You have selected a resource patch and a split APK installation has been detected, so patching errors may occur.
Are you sure you want to proceed?
patcherView.armv7WarningDialogText: Patching on ARMv7 devices is not yet supported and might fail. Proceed anyways?
patcherView.splitApkWarningDialogText: Patching a split APK is not yet supported and might fail. Proceed anyways?

appSelectorView.downloadToast: Download function is not available yet
appSelectorView.featureNotAvailableText: This application is a split APK and cannot be selected. Unfortunately, this feature is only available for rooted users at the moment. However, you can still install the application by selecting its APK files from your device's storage instead

patchesSelectorView.noSavedPatches:
No saved patches for the selected app.
Press Done to save current selection.
patchesSelectorView.noPatchesFound: No patches found for the selected app
patchesSelectorView.selectAllPatchesWarningContent: You are about to select all patches, that includes non-suggested patches and can cause unwanted behavior.

patchItem.unsupportedPatchVersion: Patch is not supported for this app version. Enable the experimental toggle in settings to proceed.

installerView.notificationText: Tap to return to the installer
installerView.installErrorDialogText1:
Root install is not possible with the current patches selection.
Repatch your app or choose non-root install.
installerView.installErrorDialogText2:
Non-root install is not possible with the current patches selection.
Repatch your app or choose root install if you have your device rooted.
installerView.installErrorDialogText3:
Root install is not possible as the original APK was selected from storage.
Select an installed app or choose non-root install.
installerView.noExit: Installer is still running, cannot exit...

settingsView.dynamicThemeHint: Enjoy an experience closer to your device
settingsView.fetchAppInfoDialogText: Note: Your IP address will be sent to the selected sources to fetch the app icon and name.
settingsView.fetchAppInfoLabelHint: Fetch app icon and name from external sources for apps that are not installed on this device
settingsView.sourcesResetDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset custom sources to their default values?
settingsView.apiURLResetDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset API URL to its default value?
settingsView.contributorsHint: A list of contributors of ReVanced
settingsView.experimentalUniversalPatchesHint: Display all applications to use with universal patches, loading list of apps may be slower
settingsView.experimentalPatchesHint: Enable usage of unsupported patches in any app version
settingsView.restartAppForChanges: Restart the app to apply changes
settingsView.exportPatchesHint: Export patches selection to a JSON file
settingsView.importPatchesHint: Import patches selection from a JSON file
settingsView.resetStoredPatchesDialogText: Are you sure you want to reset the stored patches selection?
settingsView.deleteKeystoreHint: Delete the keystore used to sign the app
settingsView.deleteKeystoreDialogText: Are you sure you want to delete the keystore used to sign patched applications?
settingsView.exportKeystoreHint: Export keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.importKeystoreHint: Import keystore used to sign apps
settingsView.selectKeystorePasswordHint: Select keystore password used to sign the apk
settingsView.jsonSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected JSON file
settingsView.keystoreSelectorErrorMessage: Unable to use selected KEYSTORE file

appInfoView.unpatchDialogText: Are you sure you want to unpatch this app?
appInfoView.rootDialogText:
App was installed with superuser permissions, but currently ReVanced Manager has no permissions.
Please grant superuser permissions first.
appInfoView.updateNotImplemented: This feature has not been implemented yet
